Headline: #37 Sedgwick Temporary Northbound Reroute near Canal/Harrison
ShortDescription: NB 37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Clinton, Harrison, Jefferson, and Jackson due to, water department construction near Canal/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Clinton, Harrison, Jefferson, and Jackson due to, water department construction near Canal/Harrison.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison, #157 Streeterville/Taylor, #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Canal/Harrison

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #7 Harrison, #157 Streeterville/Taylor, #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Jefferson, Jackson, and Canal, due to water department construction near Canal/Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange and Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange and Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier fire department activity near Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange and Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier fire department activity near Roosevelt.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Harlem and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
